forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will give way to occasional showers during the afternoon. High 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun this morning followed by increasing clouds with showers developing this afternoon. High 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. High 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 7C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 45F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 30F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low 29F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early with periods of light rain and snow developing later in the day. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early followed by a mixture of light rain and snow in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers around in the evening. Low around -5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the evening. Low 22F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 34F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low near 20F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 33F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low around 20F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
